application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for conditions 4 (Samples of the facing materials) and 5 (Demolition and construction management plan) of planning permission 19/01604/FUL (Erection of a two-storey detached dwelling and provision of 2no. car parking spaces)
decision_conditions: The information submitted in relation to Condition 5 (Demolition and construction management plan) of planning permission 19/01604/FUL is considered insufficient and fails to demonstrate that the construction management plan would safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: No objections

Please provide a Proposed Block Plan drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
